title: [Large-Scale] Rule-Based Conceptual Learning Design: Mastering Advanced Mathematical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Understanding of Secondary-Level Mathematical Formulas
context.additional_context: A course designed for systematic acquisition of mathematical concepts in a smartphone-centric learning environment, with continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain core rules of mathematical concepts with 90% accuracy.
Learners can determine the scope of concept application with 85% accuracy by analyzing given examples and non-examples.
Learners can successfully apply rule-based learning strategies to new mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
